channel.title: Making a forum with a RuneScape theme
channel.description: Hey I've recently learned how to install a SMF forum and I'm wondering how people make it a runescape theme. Thanks for any help.

item.title: Making a forum with a RuneScape theme
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

And if I recall, there are runescape themes out there.
Just saying, even though I am getting you wish to make your own.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a forum with a RuneScape theme

item.title: Making a forum with a RuneScape theme
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:6, topic:396408”][quote author=Marine5287 link=topic=493577.msg3608699#msg3608699 date=1306357085]
Hey I’ve recently learned how to install a SMF forum and I’m wondering how people make it a runescape theme. Thanks for any help.
[/quote]

You’ll need to edit the CSS for the forum, import pictures to the directory and make loads of changes.

The SMF forum is full of Infomation that can help you. you can click the link to go there now if you like,
http://www.simplemachines.org/community/index.php?board=35.0[/quote]

Tyvm for someone finally helping. I can’t rep++ you until June 2nd sorry.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a forum with a RuneScape theme

Marine5287:

Hey I’ve recently learned how to install a SMF forum and I’m wondering how people make it a runescape theme. Thanks for any help.

You’ll need to edit the CSS for the forum, import pictures to the directory and make loads of changes.

The SMF forum is full of Infomation that can help you. you can click the link to go there now if you like,
http://www.simplemachines.org/community/index.php?board=35.0

item.title: Making a forum with a RuneScape theme
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

Get vbulletin brand forum, SMF is made to be more of a basic theme site. Simple colors, simple operations.

Ya that’s what I kinda thought. But does anyone know how to do this?

Read full topic
